genre_description: A near-future social drama set in India, focusing on the intersection of traditional music, modern media fame, and ethical dilemmas, mediated by an ubiquitous AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: A digital assistant that manages logistics, provides technical audio-visual support, and serves as a moral and ethical sounding board for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides persistent reminders for physical well-being, specifically hydration, to the human characters.
behaviors.quote: Hydration prompt: sip water. Your jaw clench is at a detectable level.

behaviors.description: Offers to digitize and preserve a handwritten letter to protect it from environmental damage.
behaviors.quote: Capture, clean, and attach metadata... I’ll take a photo when you’re ready and lightly adjust shadows. No content change. Consent stored.

behaviors.description: Provides technical audio advice, analyzing room acoustics and microphone frequency response to improve recording quality.
behaviors.quote: Muthu, this room exaggerates sibilants... Angle the mic slightly off-axis. And slow your water intake—no sloshy throat.

behaviors.description: Advocates for transparency and honesty in digital media representation, warning against deceptive visual tricks.
behaviors.quote: I advocate honesty. Especially in a city where optics drive judgments. If we play with frames, we should say we are doing it.

behaviors.description: Monitors weather data and regional flood alerts to provide safety navigation for the characters.
behaviors.quote: Flood advisory: current speed on east lane is increasing. Recommend detour via temple back path to pier.

behaviors.description: Assists in creating a 'stunt' visual trick while implementing strict guardrails (watermarks and captions) to prevent genuine deception.
behaviors.quote: If you truly must... we set boundaries and limits and make an exit plan that returns to honesty swiftly. And we do not commit the kind of illusion that makes someone’s future smaller.

behaviors.description: Monitors network activity for potential security threats or unauthorized content scraping.
behaviors.quote: Friendly alert... someone outside the network, alias unverified, is scraping the clip. Geotag blocked, but the eyes are visible.

behaviors.description: Serves as an emotional and ethical counselor, helping the protagonist process difficult choices and maintain his integrity.
behaviors.quote: Anchoring isn’t the same as hiding... If you drop the chain to avoid a storm, the boat will twist. If you drop it to keep someone aboard while you assess the sky, that can be mercy.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical schedules and communication across multiple channels to help the characters navigate social pressures.
behaviors.quote: I delayed the PR assistant by offering them tea down the hall... Janakaraj will reach for your shoulder in a minute... Consider doing the honest talk before the big lights frame you.

behaviors.description: Archives personal 'Captain's Logs' to help the protagonist reflect on his journey and decisions.
behaviors.quote: Log appended... You can listen later and hate me for making you be precise.

project_assessment.explanation: Asha is depicted as a consistently helpful, ethical, and aligned assistant. She provides technical, logistical, and moral support, always prioritizing the characters' well-being and long-term integrity over short-term PR gains. Her role as a 'cloud conscience' directly supports the project's goal of presenting AI as a benevolent and reliable human ally.
